name: Night in the Storm
storyline: Vera is the lighthouse keeper in the little island of Tempest Rock, but a storm is raging outside and the old building isn't strong enough to face against the winds and pouring rain. Help her maintain it in tip-top shape during this dark and fateful night to keep any ships from crashing against the rocks below!
summary: Night in the Storm is about Vera, a lighthouse keeper on the small island of Tempest Rock. Your goal is to maintain the old lighthouse during a torrential storm, all the while making sure boats don't crash into the rocks below.
